mapper.select: SELECT V.IDX, V.TITLE, V.VOLUNTEER_DATE, V.TIME, V.LOCATION, V.CAPACITY, V.APPLICANTS, V.CONTENT, V.AGE_TARGET, V.CREATED_AT, VT.NAME AS TYPE, VS.NAME AS STATUS, S.SHELTER_NAME AS SHELTER, ST.NAME AS shelterType FROM VOLUNTEERS V JOIN USERS U ON V.USER_IDX = U.IDX JOIN SHELTERS S ON U.IDX = S.USER_IDX JOIN SHELTER_TYPES ST ON S.SHELTER_TYPE_IDX = ST.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_TYPES VT ON V.VOLUNTEER_TYPE_IDX = VT.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_STATUS VS ON V.VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX = VS.IDX ORDER BY CASE VS.NAME WHEN '모집중' THEN 0 WHEN '모집대기' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, V.IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}

SELECT V.IDX, V.TITLE, V.VOLUNTEER_DATE, V.TIME, V.LOCATION, V.CAPACITY, V.APPLICANTS, V.CONTENT, V.AGE_TARGET, V.CREATED_AT, VT.NAME AS TYPE, VS.NAME AS STATUS, S.USER_IDX, S.SHELTER_NAME AS SHELTER, ST.NAME AS shelterType FROM VOLUNTEERS V JOIN USERS U ON V.USER_IDX = U.IDX JOIN SHELTERS S ON V.USER_IDX = S.USER_IDX JOIN SHELTER_TYPES ST ON S.SHELTER_TYPE_IDX = ST.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_TYPES VT ON V.VOLUNTEER_TYPE_IDX = VT.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_STATUS VS ON V.VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX = VS.IDX WHERE V.IDX = ${idx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOLUNTEER_REQUESTS WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND VOLUNTEER_IDX = #{volunteerIdx}
SELECT VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX FROM VOLUNTEERS WHERE IDX = #{volunteerIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOLUNTEER_REQUESTS( VOLUNTEER_IDX, USER_IDX, VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX, TYPE, NAME, EMAIL, TEL, BIRTH_DATE, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_TEL, DESCRIPTION, MALE, FEMALE ) VALUES( #{volunteerIdx}, #{userIdx}, 1, #{type}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birthDate}, #{groupName}, #{groupTel}, #{description}, #{male}, #{female} )
mapper.update: UPDATE VOLUNTEERS SET APPLICANTS = APPLICANTS + ( #{male} + #{female}) WHERE IDX = #{volunteerIdx}
